titleStmt.title: Minutes of the TEI Technical Council
titleStmt.meeting: TEI Technical Council online meeting : 8 July 2021

sourceDesc.p: Retagged from a WordPress HTML file

revisionDesc.change: Extracted from Word Press article with id post-31157

list.item: EBB would prefer to start at 16:00 ET on Fri, if possible.
So far Fri 01 and Sat 02 Oct look like the best.
Resolved! Date of SVF2F is October 1–2.
Remember, a discussion of a gender (as opposed to sex) element should be on agenda — done

Conceived of as small groups (2–4 people) getting together to address a particular ticket or other issue. Planned for July & August
JJ is interested. Still in learning mode!
EBB & JJ are planning to do P5subset update this month (thinking last week in July).
Current thought is for folks to pick an issue (ticket or otherwise) and then ask a potential “buddy” via e-mail, or to find a “buddy” to join them via a posting to #general on Slack.

FR for new ellipsis element: https://github.com/TEIC/TEI/issues/1877
Council considered the name again, and while some are worried the name “ellipsis” will lead to misunderstanding, we did not come up with a better name.
It was suggested that the content of ellipsis require a minimum of 1 metamark.
The prose should make clear that ellipsis is for a specific phenomena, not for general-purpose encoding of ellipses. E.g, “…” or “* * *” used to indicate a speaker is pausing or trailing off. And not intended for interpretive stuff like filling in what’s missing in the ellipses points in Joyce’s Dubliners.
Try it as deliberate omission of “content” rather than simply “text”.

Add location information to the new conversion element: https://github.com/TEIC/TEI/issues/1910
EBB wants to know if Council supports going forward with a new class (att.locatable or att.placeable) with 1 attribute, the @where that is currently of event, for use by both event and conversion.
Yes, let’s make att.locatable for event/@where and conversion/@where.

Clarify description of att.combinable’s “mode”: https://github.com/TEIC/TEI/issues/1715
SB and EBB will meet and finish this one up.

Guideline issues milestone 4.3.0 https://github.com/TEIC/TEI/issues?page=1&q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+milestone%3A%22Guidelines+4.3.0%22
Discussion on which of those we can tackle before freeze.
Action on MS to send a reminder to Council members to focus on milestone 4.3.0 issues, or to remove the milestone by 2021-07-10.
